attributes.action: Change the UK passport from the EU approved one to the famous blue 1988 passport
attributes.additional_details:
Whether it's the colour or style of a passport it resembles a nations identity . 

For more than 70 years the blue passports became a travelling companion for Britons -  coming to their aid when some found themselves in unenviable situations.British double agent Robert Bruce Lockhart recounted being caught in the middle of fighting when a soldier waved his British passport in the hope of being spared in the shooting. SOURCE:BBC 

The navy blue passport is part of our British identity!
attributes.background:
In 1988 when joining the EU the UK changed its passport from blue style to the EU approved burgundy style.
Passports are part of a nations identity.THE UK GOVERNMENT SHOULD CHANGE OUR PASSPORTS BACK TO THE 1988 style of the famous navy blue to resemble the UK taking back its national sovereignty
